abstract.title: About these tools
abstract.para: Here are some useful tools you can use along with NHibernate.

section.title: Castle
section.para: The Castle Project. NHibernate uses Castle.DynamicProxy internally.

section.title: Clover.NET
section.para: Clover.NET is a code coverage tool that measures what code is being tested in the NUnit Test Fixtures. A license has been donated to the NHibernate team by Cenqua.

section.title: DocBook
section.para: DocBook is a great specification for technical documentation.

section.title: H2Reg
section.para: H2Reg is a tool used to integrate help files into Visual Studio.NET help.

section.title: Hibernate
section.para: Hibernate is the mother of NHibernate :).

It is a powerful, ultra-high performance object/relational persistence and query service for Java. Hibernate lets you develop persistent classes following common Java idiom - including association, inheritance, polymorphism, composition and the Java collections framework. The Hibernate Query Language, designed as a "minimal" object-oriented extension to SQL, provides an elegant bridge between the object and relational worlds. Hibernate also allows you to express queries using native SQL or Java-based Criteria and Example queries.

section.title: log4net
section.para: log4net is used extensively by the internals of NHibernate to generate useful logging.

section.title: NDoc
section.para: NDoc converts XML Comments in the sourcecode into a useful documentation format.

section.title: NHibernate Query Analyzer
section.para: Ayende Rahein has created a GUI to help with the process of creating/editing configuration information, hbm.xml mapping files, and HQL statements for NHibernate. You can download it on its web site.

section.title: NUnit
section.para: NUnit is the framework for write and running the test fixtures. Every developer should have this installed and be using it for his code. Note that it also has these add-ins: NUnit AddIn and NUnitForms.

section.title: ReSharper
section.para: ReSharper is a plugin for VS .NET 2003 that provides refactoring, code formatting, etc. All the things that the modern Java IDEs have that we are missing in the VS .NET world. A license has been donated to the NHibernate team by JetBrains. We are looking forward to their IDE for .NET.
